languages.text: "Угу, поди ей скажи — так мол и так, нечестивая {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g} тут про тебя нагадала кой-чего. То-то она обрадуется, поблагодарит и прислушается! Нет, бесполезно это. Да я и не уверена пока, что это вот все значит. Может, опасность для нее... а может — от нее исходящую".

traits.locale_text: "Угу, поди ей скажи — так мол и так, нечестивая {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g} тут про тебя нагадала кой-чего. То-то она обрадуется, поблагодарит и прислушается! Нет, бесполезно это. Да я и не уверена пока, что это вот все значит. Может, опасность для нее... а может — от нее исходящую".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."
languages.original_text: "Угу, поди ей скажи — так мол и так, нечестивая {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкерша{/g} тут про тебя нагадала кой-чего. То-то она обрадуется, поблагодарит и прислушается! Нет, бесполезно это. Да я и не уверена пока, что это вот все значит. Может, опасность для нее... а может — от нее исходящую".

traits.locale_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “噢，好啊，你去告诉她吧，说邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}占卜了关于她的事情。她肯定会非常开心，非常感激，也肯定很愿意听你说了什么！得了吧，这么干毫无意义。而且不仅如此，我甚至不明白这一切意味着什么。或许她会遇到危险……又或许她才是危险的源头。”
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

traits.locale_text: “噢，好啊，你去告诉她吧，说邪恶的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}占卜了关于她的事情。她肯定会非常开心，非常感激，也肯定很愿意听你说了什么！得了吧，这么干毫无意义。而且不仅如此，我甚至不明白这一切意味着什么。或许她会遇到危险……又或许她才是危险的源头。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked psyker has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

languages.text: «Sí, claro, debería decirle que la malvada {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} ha predicho algo sobre ella. ¡Estará encantada y agradecida y escuchará hasta la última palabra! No tendría mucho sentido. Y, de todas formas, tampoco sé lo que significa realmente. Puede que ella esté en peligro... o que ella sea el peligro».
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, claro, debería decirle que la malvada {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquica{/g} ha predicho algo sobre ella. ¡Estará encantada y agradecida y escuchará hasta la última palabra! No tendría mucho sentido. Y, de todas formas, tampoco sé lo que significa realmente. Puede que ella esté en peligro... o que ella sea el peligro».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ああ、そうね。邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が彼女について何かを占ったんだって、彼女に伝えたらいいわ。大喜びで感謝してくれるだろうし、もちろんその話にも耳を傾けてくれるでしょうね！いいえ、それは無意味なことよ。どうせ、あたいにもそれが何を意味するのかさえわからないのだから。もしかしたら、危険は彼女に対するものかもしれない…あるいは、危険は彼女からやって来るのなのかもしれないわ」
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうね。邪悪な{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}が彼女について何かを占ったんだって、彼女に伝えたらいいわ。大喜びで感謝してくれるだろうし、もちろんその話にも耳を傾けてくれるでしょうね！いいえ、それは無意味なことよ。どうせ、あたいにもそれが何を意味するのかさえわからないのだから。もしかしたら、危険は彼女に対するものかもしれない…あるいは、危険は彼女からやって来るのなのかもしれないわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Oh, gewiss, sagt ihr einfach, die böse {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} habe etwas über sie weisgesagt. Sie wird unendlich erfreut und dankbar sein, und natürlich wird sie euch aufmerksam zuhören! Nein, das wäre zwecklos. Und überhaupt, ich weiß nicht einmal recht, was es alles zu bedeuten hat. Vielleicht ist sie in Gefahr ... vielleicht ist sie aber auch die Gefahr."
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, gewiss, sagt ihr einfach, die böse {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psionikerin{/g} habe etwas über sie weisgesagt. Sie wird unendlich erfreut und dankbar sein, und natürlich wird sie euch aufmerksam zuhören! Nein, das wäre zwecklos. Und überhaupt, ich weiß nicht einmal recht, was es alles zu bedeuten hat. Vielleicht ist sie in Gefahr ... vielleicht ist sie aber auch die Gefahr."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Mais oui, allez donc lui dire que la vilaine {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} a fait une prédiction à son sujet. Elle sera tellement reconnaissante qu'elle se fera un plaisir de vous écouter ! Non, ça ne servirait à rien. En plus, je ne sais pas vraiment quoi en penser. Soit elle est en danger... soit le danger, c'est elle. »
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

traits.locale_text: « Mais oui, allez donc lui dire que la vilaine {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} a fait une prédiction à son sujet. Elle sera tellement reconnaissante qu'elle se fera un plaisir de vous écouter ! Non, ça ne servirait à rien. En plus, je ne sais pas vraiment quoi en penser. Soit elle est en danger... soit le danger, c'est elle. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Tabii tabii. Hiç durma. Gidip ona, uğursuz {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezerin{/g} seninle alakalı bir kehaneti var de. Öyle sevinir, öyle minnettar olur ki dediklerini kesin can kulağıyla dinler! Tabii ki uyarma, fayda etmez. Kaldı ki duyduklarımı anlamlandırabilmiş değilim. Belki tehlikededir... Belki de tehlikenin ta kendisidir."
languages.original_text: "Oh yeah, you go ahead and tell her the wicked {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} has divined something about her. She'll be so pleased and grateful, and of course she'll listen to what you have to say! No, that would be pointless. And anyway, I'm not even sure what it all means. Maybe the danger is to her... or maybe the danger's coming from her."

traits.locale_text: "Tabii ki. Hiç durma. Gidip o hayırsız {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g}in kendisini ilgilendiren bir kehaneti olduğunu söyle. Öyle memnun ve minnettar olur ki söyleyeceklerine muhakkak kulak kesilir! Tabii ki uyarma, hiç gerek yok. Ayrıca tüm bunların ne anlama geldiğinden de emin değilim. Belki o tehdit altındadır... Belki de biz onun tehdidi altındayızdır..."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
